title: Will we ever get a deer/cervine champion?
body: It's a design space that hasn't been filled yet, and I've just been craving one for years now. Maybe as a spirit or vastaya? Or just an anthro a la Ali.

replies.body: I think a deer would most fit as a Freljordian demigod; deer don't seem like a very Ionian animal all that much. Plus vastaya are clearly mixed with humans, while Freljordian demigods take the animal theme all the way and just make the animal somewhat anthropomorphic. I'd enjoy that with a deer.

Vastaya exist in more places than Ionia. Also, Ionia has at least 1 deer-like species, seen here;
https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/universe-map/en_US/b38c139a0c1c738a05ceaa0994bfa8540ad714d0/assets/images/ionia_creatures_01.jpg

I don't think there are any deer-like Vastaya tribes anyway though, so.

Freljord or some other sentient humanoid wildlife(like the Minotaurs) seems like the best option. What would the deer be a demi-god of, though? I guess flora/fauna?

If we don't get a deer champ though, someone once said that she hoped the Ivory Stag wouldn't be Thresh, but unless we get a new deer champ I think it will be.

Don't pretend WW and Kindred are similar. Maokai, Ivern, and Zyra are all based off of different things. Zyra is poison ivy from Batman. Maokai is the stereotypical defensive ent. Ivern is the Tom Bombadil of LoL.

I guess there could be a deer character, it's not up to you or me in the end.

I'm just saying I think it's too similar in shape to Hecarim, especially when he's already got a deer-like skin, to be seriously considered.

Hecarim is a centaur, and I don't think that's what OP is looking for with this deer character.

They want either a spirit(which I guess would appear like {{champion:432}}{{champion:203}}{{champion:16}}, or just a deer), a Vastaya({{champion:103}}{{champion:267}}{{champion:518}}), or an humanoid animal(not Vastaya, like {{champion:516}}{{champion:106}}{{champion:12}}).
